attributes.action: I would like equality of both Sex during a rape or abuse investigation (etc)
attributes.additional_details: any man that has been falsely accused of rape or abuse by a woman which has proven to be incorrect should receive a compensation reward of up 5 grand from the victim who is falsely accusing the male
attributes.background: A man should not be sentenced wrongly without evidence, any false rape or abuse allegations made by a women which is proven in court to be incorrect Should be sentenced to the same time in prison as a man would spend for rape or abuse

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about false accusations of rape, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

Decisions about whether to convict a person for sexual offences, including rape, are a matter for the courts, not the Government or House of Commons.

People who make a false allegation of a crime can already be prosecuted for perverting the course of justice or for wasting police time. You can find out more about this here: http://www.cps.gov.uk/legal/p_to_r/perverting_the_course_of_justice_-_rape_and_dv_allegations/
